sentences.en: It presents the full text on one page, without the pagination links.
sentences.cn: 它将全文呈现在同一页面，而不显示页码链接。
模型数据的分页及排序.

sentences.en: Number of items to render in the control. The value '0'indicates automatic pagination.
sentences.cn: 要在控件中呈现的项数. 值“0”表示自动分页.

sentences.en: Pagination : The numbering of the make - up pages in consecutive order of a book.
sentences.cn: 编页码: 在拼版后的书页加上顺序页码的情况.

sentences.en: Web pagination technology separated into two types of temporary Recordset and storage procedure.
sentences.cn: Web分页技术分为临时记录集和存储过程分页.

words.tran_cn: 页；记录；大事件，时期；男侍者

trans.tran_cn: <术>页码，页码标注，编页码，标注页码
trans.tran_en: the process of giving a number to each page of a book, magazine etc
